mapper.select: SELECT u.*, e.name, e.empno FROM utility u JOIN emp e ON e.empno = u.empno Order by u.utilityYyyymm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO utility (utilityYyyymm, utilityDetail, empno, codeNum, utilityCost, utilityAttach) VALUES (#{utilityYyyymm}, #{utilityDetail}, #{empno},100, #{utilityCost}, #{utilityAttach})
